line.comment: * add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$t
* add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$t

line.text: 'Both port and virus research speed are affected by the Research rate of the sector.'
'Researching a port vulnerability allows you to install a backdoor on respective targets.'
'Researching a virus allows you to affect a target's specific system, through a backdoor.'
'For more information, please consult the Warfare section of the in-game encyclopedia.'

line.comment: * add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text='Apply to all Research stations (Terran memory)' return value='applyToAllTerranOnly'

line.text: 'Cannot research ships from a faction you are in permanent war with.'

line.comment: * $t = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.InfoText' : text='Ships with a * have high research costs.'
* add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t

line.text: 'Milestone effects only apply to the current faction.'
'To scan ships in order to discover open ports, you need to use the commands added by a Hacking Rootkit.'
'Apply port research to all Hacking stations'
'Apply virus research to all Hacking stations'
'Apply worm research to all Hacking stations'
'An active defence program has already been launched at: '
'Launch a global active defense program for '

sval.val: Both port and virus research speed are affected by the Research rate of the sector.
Researching a port vulnerability allows you to install a backdoor on respective targets.
Researching a virus allows you to affect a target's specific system, through a backdoor.
For more information, please consult the Warfare section of the in-game encyclopedia.
Apply to all Research stations (Non-Terran memory)
No Terran memory in this sector.
Cannot research ships from a faction you are in permanent war with.
Milestone effects only apply to the current faction.
To scan ships in order to discover open ports, you need to use the commands added by a Hacking Rootkit.
Apply port research to all Hacking stations
Apply virus research to all Hacking stations
Apply worm research to all Hacking stations
An active defence program has already been launched at:
Launch a global active defense program for
add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$t
add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$t
add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text='Apply to all Research stations (Terran memory)' return value='applyToAllTerranOnly'
$t = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.InfoText' : text='Ships with a * have high research costs.'
add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$t
